DOC.brief_title: Calcium Vitamin D Malnutrition Elderly Women
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct 4-year randomize , double-blind , placebo control trial calcium calcium vitamin D supplementation . We randomly sample population healthy , independent live woman 55+ year nine rural county . We randomly assign 1180 woman one three group : Group 1 receives calcium ( 1400 mg/d ) vitamin D placebo , Group 2 receives calcium ( 1400 mg/d ) vitamin D ( 1100 IU/d ) Group 3 receive placebo . A full-service market research firm randomly select telephone number household list number nine-county rural sample area . The firm continue call 1180 woman select met inclusion exclusion criterion willing participate four year prospective study calcium vitamin D supplementation . The participant enrol study May 2000 July 2001 . Participants study visit every six month . Annually follow perform : bone density scan , height weight , brief medical history include medicine change , fracture surveillance , compliance calcium vitamin D. At baseline end study , spine x-rays dietary recall obtain .
